workflow_title: AI-Powered Personalized Sustainable Travel Planner & Carbon Offset Advisor
description: Helps users plan eco-friendly trips by suggesting travel options, accommodations, and activities that minimize carbon footprints, calculates estimated carbon emissions, and provides carbon offset recommendations with integration of relevant APIs.

steps.name: User Trip Input
steps.description: Collect user trip details including origin, destination(s), travel dates, preferred travel modes, accommodation preferences, and activity interests.

steps.name: Fetch Travel Options
steps.description: Call travel data APIs to retrieve eco-friendly travel options (e.g., trains, buses, direct flights) filtering for minimal carbon footprint.

steps.name: Fetch Accommodations
steps.description: Query accommodation booking APIs to retrieve eco-certified lodging options based on user preferences.

steps.name: Fetch Eco-friendly Activities
steps.description: Use activity suggestion APIs to find sustainable and low-impact activities aligned with user interests.

steps.name: Calculate Carbon Emissions
steps.description: Estimate the carbon footprint for chosen travel, accommodation, and activities using carbon calculation API or model.

steps.name: Fetch Carbon Offset Programs
steps.description: Query carbon offset verification APIs to retrieve credible offset programs appropriate for user's emissions amount.

steps.name: Generate Personalized Itinerary
steps.description: Generate a user-friendly itinerary including travel plans, accommodations, and activities emphasizing sustainability.

steps.name: Send Carbon Impact Report and Recommendations
steps.description: Notify users with detailed carbon impact report alongside recommended carbon offset programs.

steps.name: Confirm Offset Purchase
steps.description: Facilitate purchase or commitment to carbon offset programs and confirm transactions with the user.

integrations.name: TravelDataAPI
integrations.description: Provides travel options and modes with carbon footprint data.

integrations.name: AccommodationBookingAPI
integrations.description: Provides eco-certified accommodation options and booking capabilities.

integrations.name: CarbonOffsetVerificationAPI
integrations.description: Offers verified carbon offset programs and calculates emissions.
